name: pnp-list-formatting-in-memoriam-tiles
title: In Memoriam Tiles
shortDescription: This is a silly sample that shows tombstones for items. It demonstrates custom date formatting, custom tiles (gallery) layout, and safe local image referencing.
longDescription: This is a silly sample that shows tombstones for items. It demonstrates custom date formatting, custom tiles (gallery) layout, and safe local image referencing.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
